thread.section_title: Ibis Paris Gare du Nord - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good value
thread.title_full: Good value - Review of Ibis Paris Gare du Nord, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jackie W
title: Good value
text:
We stayed at the hotel for 3 nights. It is very well located being less than 5 minutes walk from the Gare du Nord station. There is a metro station nearby too, so it is easy to travel around Paris.
Our room was modest in size but perfectly adequate. It was spotlessly clean. The bathroom was small but, again adequate,and it had a very good shower (better than we have had in some 5 star hotels). The bed was very comfortable. The only problem we had was that we found the room to be rather warm despite turning off the radiator and opening the window.
The staff on reception were excellent, being both efficient and friendly.
Wi-Fi was good with plenty of sockets both in the bedrooms and reception.
We didn't eat at the hotel so I'm unable to comment on the food.
